job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.
     * Upt to 80% work from home is possible.
job_details.full_text:
Cloud Backend Software Engineer - Golang

Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.
     * Upt to 80% work from home is possible.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend software engineering for cloud-native environments and distributed systems, specifically mentioning Kubernetes and Golang. While it mentions catering to LLM applications and streaming APIs, it does not detail core generative AI tasks like model fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG system development. The primary focus remains on traditional backend development and infrastructure, rather than the specialized tasks of a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'developing high-performance, scalable software solutions', 'designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform', 'Implement robust backend systems', and 'seamless integration with backend systems', which are core software development activities.
The role involves building systems that cater to LLM applications, implying software development around these models rather than direct model development.
job_tasks.phrase: modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack' points to the development of software components and their integration.
job_tasks.phrase: streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices

job_tasks.justification: The role is for a 'cloud-native environment' and mentions 'Kubernetes-based', which are key components of modern operational infrastructure and deployment, often associated with MLOps in an AI context.
The phrase 'Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source' directly relates to the development of backend software.
The need to 'Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams' indicates a requirement for strong communication and teamwork.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility to 'Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation' falls under the operational aspects of ensuring software quality and maintainability, which is part of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams
